name: Space Bouncer (A Short Dose of Happiness)
name_original: Space Bouncer (A Short Dose of Happiness)
description:
You must repel alien attack! But you don't have bullet so you must deflect their own bullet. Let them taste their own poison!

Game created as part of Mojiken Camp. The task is to recreate retro game, but i couldn't decide between Space Invader or Brick Breaker so I combine them both!

Use A & D to move left and right

Use Left Click to use your shield.

Shield has time to recover so mind where you activate your shield.
